articles.description: Joel Embiid will sit out because of a sprained right knee when the 76ers try to complete a sweep of the Nets on Saturday.
articles.content:
Philadelphia 76ers star Joel Embiid sustained a right knee sprain and will miss Game 4 against the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday.

articles.title: Arsenal rally to draw Saints but ceded title race to City - ESPN India
articles.description: The trend of losing composure continued for Arsenal. A furious rally with Southampton fell short and now Manchester City control the title race.
articles.content:
